title: Is Location Tracking The Reason Facebook Drains Your Battery? Learn How To Disable It.
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
Could GPS tracking be the culprit behind why the Facebook app is destroying iPhone battery life in iOS 9? I'll show you how to shut it down.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
